verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> we beseech <S%G2065><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> by <S%G5228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by our <S%G2257><s%> gathering together <S%G1997><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

That ye <S%G5209><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> soon <S%G5030><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> in <S%G575><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> be troubled, <S%G2360><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> letter <S%G1992><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> from <S%G1223><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> as that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is at hand. <S%G1764><s%>

Let no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> any <S%G3367><s%> means: <S%G5158><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> that day shall not come, except <S%G3362><s%> there come <S%G2064><s%> a falling away <S%G646><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that man <S%G444><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> be revealed, <S%G601><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of perdition; <S%G684><s%>

Who opposeth <S%G480><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exalteth himself <S%G5229><s%> above <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that is called <S%G3004><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> that is worshiped; <S%G4574><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> he <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sitteth <S%G2523><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> showing <S%G584><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> ye not, <S%G3756><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> when I was <S%G5607><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> I told <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> these things? <S%G5023><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> what withholdeth <S%G2722><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> might be revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of iniquity <S%G458><s%> doth already <S%G2235><s%> work: <S%G1754><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> he who now letteth <S%G2722><s%> <S%G737><s%> will let, until <S%G2193><s%> he be taken <S%G1096><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the way. <S%G3319><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall that Wicked <S%G459><s%> be revealed, <S%G601><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall consume <S%G355><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall destroy <S%G2673><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> brightness <S%G2015><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> coming: <S%G3952><s%>

Even him, whose <S%G3739><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the working <S%G1753><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lying <S%G5579><s%> wonders, <S%G5059><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> deceivableness <S%G539><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them that perish; <S%G622><s%> because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they received <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G26><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> for this cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall send <S%G3992><s%> them <S%G846><s%> strong delusion, <S%G1753><s%> <S%G4106><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> should believe <S%G4100><s%> a lie: <S%G5579><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> might be damned <S%G2919><s%> who believed <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> but <S%G235><s%> had pleasure <S%G2106><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are bound <S%G3784><s%> to give thanks <S%G2168><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> beloved <S%G25><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> chosen <S%G138><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> belief <S%G4102><s%> of the truth: <S%G225><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the obtaining <S%G4047><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Therefore, <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> stand fast, <S%G4739><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hold <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> traditions <S%G3862><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have been taught, <S%G1321><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> epistle. <S%G1992><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> himself, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> which hath loved <S%G25><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> us everlasting <S%G166><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%>

Comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>
